content: spiral hot pad g hook cotton yarn -i love this cotton mango pictured spirals make 2 round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 12 double_crochet in the mc join with a slip_stitch to the top of the first double_crochet 12 round 2 chain 2 fpdc around the first double_crochet skipping the chain 2 double_crochet in the space behind the fpdc join with a slip_stitch to the first double_crochet 24 round 3 chain 2 fpdc around the first double_crochet skipping the chain 2 place 2 double_crochet in the space behind the fpdc join with a slip_stitch to the first double_crochet 36 round 4 chain 2 fpdc around the first double_crochet skipping the chain 2 place 3 double_crochet in the space behind the fpdc join with a slip_stitch to the first double_crochet 48 round 5 chain 2 fpdc around the first double_crochet skipping the chain 2 place 4 double_crochet in the space behind the fpdc join with a slip_stitch to the first double_crochet 60 round 6 chain 2 fpdc around the first double_crochet skipping the chain 2 place 5 double_crochet in the space behind the fpdc join with a slip_stitch to the first double_crochet 72 round 7 chain 2 fpdc around the first double_crochet skipping the chain 2 place 6 double_crochet in the space behind the fpdc join with a slip_stitch to the first double_crochet 84 round 8 chain 2 fpdc around the first double_crochet skipping the chain 2 place 7 double_crochet in the space behind the fpdc join with a slip_stitch to the first double_crochet fo 96 after the 2nd piece do not fo round 9 with wrong sides facing place a stitch marker in each depression between the scallops and single_crochet in each stitch through both thicknesses beginning in a depression after single_crochet through the last st chain 10 slip_stitch back into the same stitch and single_crochet back across the chains to make a thicker hanging loop fo and weave in ends
